django.db.backends.postgresql.base
==================================

.. py:module:: django.db.backends.postgresql.base

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   PostgreSQL database backend for Django.

   Requires psycopg2 >= 2.8.4 or psycopg >= 3.1.8



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.db.backends.postgresql.base.TIMESTAMPTZ_OID


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.db.backends.postgresql.base.DatabaseWrapper
   django.db.backends.postgresql.base.CursorMixin


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.db.backends.postgresql.base.psycopg_version

   .. py:attribute:: ops_class


   .. py:method:: get_database_version()

      Return a tuple of the database's version.
      E.g. for pg_version 120004, return (12, 4).



   .. py:method:: get_connection_params()


   .. py:method:: get_new_connection(conn_params)


   .. py:method:: ensure_timezone()


   .. py:method:: ensure_role()


   .. py:method:: init_connection_state()


   .. py:method:: create_cursor(name=None)


   .. py:method:: tzinfo_factory(offset)


   .. py:method:: chunked_cursor()


   .. py:method:: check_constraints(table_names=None)

      Check constraints by setting them to immediate. Return them to deferred
      afterward.



   .. py:method:: is_usable()


   .. py:method:: pg_version()


   .. py:method:: make_debug_cursor(cursor)


.. py:class:: CursorMixin

   A subclass of psycopg cursor implementing callproc.
